Articles.Content:
So I went to my Experimental Design building at the BAe production plant and found this

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/8XQys)

It's reasonably maneuverable and fast. Rotation speed is 60mps, but be careful not to break your engine on takeoff.

The missiles work and have reasonable accuracy. Just point and stage.

Here is the DL: [http://www./download/81q9w2aq8crd1rd/Bajeebus+Aerospace+Engineering+Wolfshark+UAV.craft](http://www./download/81q9w2aq8crd1rd/Bajeebus+Aerospace+Engineering+Wolfshark+UAV.craft)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-06T02:37:53Z" title="07/06/2015 02:37  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 6, 2015</time> by JDarksword**
  
I messed up album

You can embed imgur albums with the forum's BBCode system like this:

[noparse]

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/8XQys)

[/noparse]
Which gives this:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/8XQys)

Nice craft!

> 
> You can embed imgur albums with the forum's BBCode system like this:
> [noparse][http://imgur.com/a/8XQys](http://imgur.com/a/8XQys)[/noparse]

Thank you so much
